dc:description: John Scott & Company, architecture firm. Built during 1895 and 1896. Demolished in 1977 to make room for the expansion of the Chemistry Building. Barbour Gymnasium (for women) was attached to the north side of the Waterman Gymnasium.
Image taken looking west at entrance on North University and Chemistry addition (1947).

dc:memberOf.title: Bentley Image Bank, Bentley Historical Library
